mapper.insert: insert into aircraft_type (aircraft_type_id, type, max_fuel, max_takeoff_weight, engine_count, max_thrust, cruising_distance, max_seat, heigh, length, width, cabin_width, max_speed, engine_type, cruising_speed, company, pic) values (#{aircraftTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxFuel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxTakeoffWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{engineCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxThrust,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cruisingDistance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{heigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{length,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{width,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cabinWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maxSpeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{engineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cruisingSpeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update aircraft_type set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_fuel = #{maxFuel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_takeoff_weight = #{maxTakeoffWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, engine_count = #{engineCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_thrust = #{maxThrust,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cruising_distance = #{cruisingDistance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_seat = #{maxSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, heigh = #{heigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, length = #{length,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, width = #{width,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cabin_width = #{cabinWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, max_speed = #{maxSpeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, engine_type = #{engineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cruising_speed = #{cruisingSpeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company = #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where aircraft_type_id = #{aircraftTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select aircraft_type_id, type, max_fuel, max_takeoff_weight, engine_count, max_thrust, cruising_distance, max_seat, heigh, length, width, cabin_width, max_speed, engine_type, cruising_speed, company, pic from aircraft_type where aircraft_type_id = #{aircraftTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select aircraft_type_id, type, max_fuel, max_takeoff_weight, engine_count, max_thrust, cruising_distance, max_seat, heigh, length, width, cabin_width, max_speed, engine_type, cruising_speed, company, pic from aircraft_type
